title: @NewShopHelp
body: How Do I check what Ive recently bought? Also where can I "refund" something I bought.

replies.body:
Hey,

Head over to your store tab (Orange Treasure Chest near the top). When you're in the store, all the way to the right will be an "Account" button (a person with a gear behind it). Located right next to the Orange RP purchasing and Gifting tab. Click on the account button.

Purchase History will be on the left. 

Go wild.
